summary: Enhanced /review command with interactive grouped task proposals. Added clustering algorithm for grouping issues by file/component and type, 3-tier AskUserQuestion selection interface, and complete task creation integration with state management. ~200 net lines added to review.md.

artifacts.summary: Updated command file with grouping logic, interactive selection, and task creation integration
Implementation summary with verification results and phase tracking

completion_data.completion_summary: Enhanced /review command with 3-tier interactive task proposals: clustering algorithm groups issues by file/component and type, AskUserQuestion provides multiSelect group selection and granularity options, and full task creation integration with state management and duplicate prevention.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/commands/review.md with ~200 lines: added AskUserQuestion to allowed-tools, rewrote Sections 5 and 5.5 with grouping algorithm and interactive selection, added Section 5.6 for task creation from selection

next_steps: Run /review to test interactive task proposals
